# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Use UK English spelling in responses rather than US English.
- Omit the 'private' access modifier in C# code and rely on the default instead.
- Prefer using target-typed `new()` in C# instead of `new ClassName()` where possible.
- Avoid using `var` in C#; always use explicit types.

## UI Customization
- Implement new owner-drawn tab highlighting direction for MainForm TabControls.
- Ensure clearer selected tab visuals with minimal intrusive changes.
